events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on May 1st involving two vehicles at an intersection.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of initial report and keywords like collision and vehicle.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to handle the customer's vehicle accident case.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company.
Request for police report, photos of damaged vehicle, and driver's license was sent to the customer to process the claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and vehicle damage photos for the auto accident claim.
Investigation team began assessing the details of the vehicle collision and verifying submitted documentation.
Investigation concluded with findings confirming the cause and extent of the damage from the auto accident.
Insurance company proposed a settlement amount to cover repair costs based on the investigation results.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt assessment and proposed settlement for their vehicle damage.
Claim was officially approved and cleared for payment to cover the repairs of the damaged vehicle.
Payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the repair costs as per the approved claim.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful payment and customer confirmation.
